have a blue service let's call this service version 1.1 running on your on your servers and you have a new change
version 1.2 that you want to deploy now when you deploy version 1.2 there's
still customers using version 1.1 and you have to drain that connection pool before you can completely move over to
version 1.2 the idea with blue green is that you have 100% availability during
this transition because as system is draining from the blue side of the deployment
new users are coming up on the green side version 1.2 so where the challenge with that comes and we talked about that
